references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
formula: a(n):=sum(k=1..n, sum(i=0..n-k, binomial(n,i)*k^i*stirling1(n-i,k))), n>0, a(0)=1. [From Vladimir Kruchinin, Jun 01 2011]|a(n)| ~ n!/(Gamma(-exp(-1))*n^(1+exp(-1))). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Jun 27 2013
author: _Simon Plouffe_
extensions: Definition and terms corrected, and more terms by Joerg Arndt, Jun 01 2011.
